home.subtitle: Developer Relations Engineer
home.aboutMe: Here's where I share my portfolio, including my blog posts, apps, projects, and even some silly JavaScript games. I currently work at Google, where I build sample applications and maintain code snippets for Google Cloud customers. I have a wide range of interests in technology; I tend to focus most on AI/ML, databases, data analytics, and data pipelines. All opinions expressed are mine.
home.heroImageAlt: Me and my very Best Dude

skills.title: Family First
skills.description: My family means the world to me. They keep me centered, they give me purpose, and they make me laugh. I am so blessed to have my people in my life.

skills.title: Love for Programming
skills.description: I love writing and code and learning about computer science. For me, programming is a passion. I feel so fortunate to be able to write code for a living. I enjoy sharing my enthusiasm for coding with others.

skills.title: Constant Growth
skills.description: I embrace the growth mindset. I know that I have so much more to learn; I eagerly embrace opportunity to broaden my experiences. I actively seek out mentors who can guide me towards new horizons.

skills.title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
skills.description: I find the AI/ML domain to be endlessly fascinating. I have had the opportunity to work on flagship AI/ML products as a Googler, including Gemini and Vertex AI.
